parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the proxy cluster. You can query the name of the proxy cluster in the Security Center console.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: ProxyUuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the proxy node. You can call the DescribeHybridProxyList operation to query the UUID of the proxy node.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The description of the proxy cluster.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the server on which the Security Center agent is installed. You can query the UUID by querying asset information.
